title: Australian diary. No. 021
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Medical aid for the children of the far west. Officials of the Far Wesr Children’s Health Scheme visit Tibooburra school and aboriginal camp on the Queensland border. Experts milk lake trout of their eggs which are hatched at the hatchery and young trout are released back to the rivers in Victoria. Toronga Park Zoo kindergarten caters for young animal lovers. Modern machinery revolutionises heavy work; a demonstration of heavy machinery available to Australian industries from the Commonwealth Handling Equipment Pool.
